title: Take your next corporate group to two exceptional destinations
text:
Take your next corporate group to two exceptional destinations Take your next corporate group to two exceptional destinations Details   15:15 At JW Marriott Hotel Hong Kong and JW Marriott Hotel Macau Designed for meeting organisers looking to take their corporate group off-site for a unique experience, JW Marriott Hotel Hong Kong and JW Marriott Hotel Macau are partnering together to offer an attractive corporate accommodation deal that will surely delight all delegates. 
For bookings from now to June 2016 and with a minimum of 10 guestrooms, the package includes a welcome drink; breakfast for up to 2 persons per room; 1 complimentary room for every 35 paying guestrooms per night (up to a maximum of 3 rooms); up to a maximum of 3 upgrades to the next available room category and a special **8% rebate off the final master bill for guestrooms only. To enjoy this fabulous deal, the offer must be booked at both JW Marriott Hotel Hong Kong and JW Marriott Hotel Macau. JW Marriott Hotel Hong Kong is located in the prestigious Pacific Place complex in the heart of downtown, with many spectacular attractions in close proximity as well as direct access to Pacific Place Shopping Mall, offering 150 retail shops, restaurants and a Cineplex, and only a two minute walk to the nearest MTR (Mass Transit Railway) and one ride awayto famous Tsim Sha Tsui shopping belt. Comprising 602 well-appointed guestrooms with complimentary in-room internet connectivity, the hotel offers an ideal venue for large incentive and conference groups for accommodations. In addition to over 12,000square feet of meeting space, including the largest hotel ballroom on Hong Kong Island; providing suitable options for a variety of business events for up to 1,100 guests, complemented by innovative culinary creations to delight even the most discerning palates. Set within one of the world’s most spectacular entertainment and leisure destinations, Galaxy Macau, Asia's largest JW Marriott–JW Marriott Hotel Macauboasts a prime location, with some of Macau's most intriguing attractions, including the ruins of St. Paul's Cathedral, are just a short distance from the hotel.Settle into one of the 1,015 hotel rooms and suites with free internet connectivity, styled with 5-star sophistication and overlooking magnificent views of the Grand Resort Deck and CotaiMacao. Those planning an event will be thrilled with the expansive venue. Related articles
